column4: so i have an issue with nautilus.  it randomly doesn't show files in folders!  it literally says 0 items.  i can view the same files using ls, thunar, etc...
it's for my girlfriend, i want to make this as *simple* (read: break-proof) as possible.
thanks!  that site is awesome, i've used it before for going to "pure-gnome", "pure-kde" etc.
